title: Get To The Good Part
description: If things aren’t good, God’s not done. In “Get To The Good Part,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church turns to the story of Joseph to show us that God can bring hope to even the darkest parts of our lives.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: If things aren’t good, God’s not done. In “Get To The Good Part,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church turns to the story of Joseph to show us that God can bring hope to even the darkest parts of our lives.
